title: Ledge Forge Assets
desc: Atus Assets, or ATU, assets are community-voted assets that exist and can be in the form of fiat currencies, cryptocurrencies, stocks, commodities, and anything else that has a price.

title: Stake & Earn
desc: Bonuses or interest payments may vary depending on factors such as staking length, cryptocurrency, and platform policies. However, Atus offers a Stake index that is superior to what other platforms offer.

title: Build
desc: These dApps and smart contracts are built using programming languages like Solidity and can provide a wide range of functionality such as decentralized finance (DeFi), non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and decentralized exchanges (DEXs).

title: Safe and Secure
desc: Atus combines decentralized authentication and authorization mechanisms, which can provide a more secure and private way of authenticating users than traditional centralized systems.
